content: 3 double_crochet in next ch1 space ch1 3 double_crochet ch2 3 double_crochet in center ch2 space move marker up ch1 3 double_crochet in next ch1 space ch1 double_crochet in turning chain turn row 5 ch3 counts as 1 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in ch1 space ch1 *3 double_crochet in next ch1 space ch1* repeat between * to center ch2 space 3 double_crochet ch2 3 double_crochet in center ch2 space move marker up ch1 *3 double_crochet in next ch1 space ch1* repeat between * to end 3 double_crochet in turning chain turn 2 double_crochet clusters increased carissaknits com carissaknits@gmail com 2 final row ch4 skip center ch1 space slip st into turning chain of row below row 8 ch4 counts as 1 double_crochet plus ch1 *3 double_crochet in next ch1 space ch1* repeat between * to center ch2 space double_crochet in center ch2 space turn 38 double_crochet clusters finishing cut yarn tie off weave in ends and block this is where the row will now begin and if desired make a tassel with the remaining end the new center will be on the opposite yarn and attach to the center point side where the corners were joined remove marker from old center ch2 space and place it on new center ch1 space between the 19th and 20th double_crochet clusters row 9 ch4 counts as 1 double_crochet plus ch1 *3 double_crochet in next ch1 space ch1* repeat between * to center ch1 space skip center ch1 space *3 double_crochet in next ch1 space ch1* repeat between * to end double_crochet in turning chain turn 2 double_crochet clusters decreased repeat row 9 until only 2 double_crochet clusters remain carissaknits com carissaknits@gmail com 3
